page.title: 15Population of Ref.02760084
page.content: The total population of this area is about 130. Of these about 50 live in the hamlet of Doccombe and 80 in scattered farmsteads. Nine of these farmsteads are occupied by working farmers and their families. Most of the others are no longer farms,the land having been sold to the working farmers,and are occupied by the wealthy middle_aged.The people living in Doccombe are mainly retired people of the professional classes. Consequently there are very few children living in the area and a general description of the population would be sparse,wealthy and over sixty.
